bib.title: Adaptive System for the Integration of Recommendation Methods with Social Filtering Enhancement
bib.author: Wyspia{\u{E}}skiego, Wybrze{\=I}e
bib.venue: New Trends in Multimedia and Network …
bib.abstract: We try to find the new application for recommender systems: online social networks. The innovative system for personalized and adaptive integration of recommendation methods is presented. The unique idea of the social filtering for network members is introduced and incorporated into recommender system.
bib.journal: New Trends in Multimedia and Network Information Systems
